name: The pond & the stars
description:
The game was created with Godot engine 3.5.1 stable. It’s our entry for LDJam 51. This has been quite a difficult challenge for us. We didn't have the full 3 days and we choose a pretty big project. But we managed to make it!

We hope you'll enjoy playing it as much as we had fun making it.

Known issues: On some browsers, you may experience some slight sound latency and stuttering.

Tools:

  • Godot Engine
  • Gimp
  • Mypaint
  • A bunch of synths and effects

Fonts:

  • Cantique by Velvetyne
  • IM Fell English by Igino Marini
